    "type": "git",

  "dependencies": {
    "@types/bonjour": "^3.5.6",
    "@types/node": "^13.9.5",
    "@types/node-schedule": "^1.3.2",
    "axios": "^0.21.1",

    "getmac": "^5.5.0",
    "mqtt": "^4.2.6",
    "node-schedule": "^2.0.0",
    "pauseable": "^0.3.2",
    "qrcode-terminal": "^0.12.0",
    "rxjs": "^6.5.5",
    "wireless-tools": "^0.19.0",
    "ws": "^7.4.6"
  }
}

files.name: readme.md
files.content:
# blinker JavaScript/TypeScript SDK  

SDK **Linux/Windows/MacOS** MQTT  
****  

WiFi  
MQTT  

## 
:  

**blinker APP**  
**Android**  
[](https://github.com/blinker-iot/app-release/releases)  androidblinker  
**IOS**  
[](https://itunes.apple.com/cn/app/id1357907814)  app storeblinker  


## /  
blinkernodejs LTSTs-Node  
```
npm i -g ts-node
git clone https://github.com/blinker-iot/blinker-js.git
cd blinker-js
npm i
```

## appSecret Key  
1. App+ ****    
2. **Arduino > WiFi**  
3. **Secret Key**  

## DIY  
1.   
2. 
3.  ****  
   
##  

**.\example\example_hello.ts**  appSecret Key  
```
let device = new BlinkerDevice('xxxxxxxxxxxx');
```

```
ts-node .\example\example_hello.ts
```

> blinker81sudo  

##   

APP  
~  

## blinker  

####   
[](?file=002-/001- "")  

####   

[Nodejs](https://diandeng.tech/doc/getting-start-nodejs "Nodejs")  [JavaScript/TypeScript ](https://diandeng.tech/doc/javascript-support)) 
####   

[Github](https://github.com/blinker-iot/blinker-js/tree/typescript/example)  

####   
[](https://diandeng.tech/doc/layouter-2)  

#### GPIO  
[pigpio](https://github.com/fivdi/pigpio)  

##   


```javascript
import { BlinkerDevice } from '../lib/blinker';
import { ButtonWidget, NumberWidget } from '../lib/widget';

let device = new BlinkerDevice(/*Secret Key*/);

// 
let button1: ButtonWidget = device.addWidget(new ButtonWidget('btn-123'));
let button2: ButtonWidget = device.addWidget(new ButtonWidget('btn-abc'));
let number1: NumberWidget = device.addWidget(new NumberWidget('num-abc'));

let num = 0;

device.ready().then(() => {

    device.dataRead.subscribe(message => {
        console.log('otherData:', message);
    })

    button1.listen().subscribe(message => {
        console.log('button1:', message.data);
        num++;
        number1.value(num).update();
    })

    button2.listen().subscribe(message => {
        console.log('button2:', message.data);
        // 
    })

})
```

##
